krishna_resume.profile: Creative UX & Digital Content Designer with 5+ years of experience across UX design and writing, content strategy, communications, and brand storytelling. Brings user experience to life through creative coding, motion design, and high-fidelity prototypes. Core values - empathy, sustainability, equity and freedom for all to live a good life.

work_experience.title: UX Consultant (including internship)
highlights: Designed and refined user interfaces for a customized foundation kiosk using pre-existing design systems
Improved kiosk navigation by designing 10+ user flows through iterative Figma prototyping

work_experience.title: Communications Manager
highlights: Led a cross-functional team of designers, content writers, worked parallelly with website developers
Wireframed mobile, website, and magazine UX for members
Designed and launched referral and outreach initiatives, enrolling 700 new members

work_experience.title: SEO Content Writer
highlights: Wrote 56 SEO-optimized blogs placing Ladakh Bike Trips to #1 on Google search results
Worked closely with the development team on website UX

work_experience.title: Client Relations Manager
highlights: Managed client communication workflows solo while collaborating on product development
Conducted user-behaviour analysis on subscribers, created systems to optimize customer care

work_experience.title: Freelance Designer & Writer
highlights: UX writing, packaging design, visual and written content creation, mobile app interfaces, short-form video strategy

university_experience.title: Graduate Assistant, Supervisor
highlights: Planned and facilitated team-building activities for student organizations, schools, and corporates (largest group - 150)
Coordinated programs and logistics for adventure-based group experiences
Supported staff and participants to ensure safety, preparedness, and smooth operations

university_experience.title: Crew Member
highlights: Supported students and faculty in using makerspace tools and prototyping equipment using UX principles
Assisted with workshops and hands-on innovation activities
Maintained a safe, inclusive, and collaborative design environment

leadership_experience: Leader counsellor at Peak Summer Camp, KSU (led a team of 16 counsellors)
Chief content executive, Primal Woke (led 4 interns)
Founder and ex-President of Kent Indian Dance Association (led group activities with 40 students)
Started and led NGO - Riding the Blues
